name: Think It
description:
This is a 2d platformer made on unity engine for nkmr game jam (BADA SOCH).
Theme----- THINK BIG
this game is based on a robot who is programmed to clean stuff but accidentally came across a cave which led him to a box full of evils. When u opened it all evils got freed.

The box also gave u the ability to think. Use ur thinking to fight off al the evils.
Please see the help section in the game before playing.
